backend/main.mo: Main actor defining order management system with types (Order, OrderType, OrderStatus, DesignMapping, Karigar), persistent storage maps, and functions for saving orders, managing karigars, design mappings, and assigning orders to karigars with batch processing.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining the State type containing all persistent maps (orders, designMappings, designImages, masterDesignMappings, karigars, masterDesignKarigars) and a run function that currently returns state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: Excel parsing normalization, Master Design Excel column mapping, automatic order updates on upload, and confirmation message display after mapping.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including routing, dashboard tabs with filtering (order type, karigar, search, date range), order ingestion with batch processing, unmapped codes management, and master designs page with Excel upload.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for UI elements (background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, sidebar, charts).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Jewellery Order Management System', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with 8 routes (dashboard, ingest-orders, unmapped-codes, master-designs, design-images, tag-printing, barcode-scanning, karigar detail), QueryClient, ThemeProvider, SidebarProvider layout, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Custom: Dashboard tab component displaying CO (Customer Order) type orders with real-time search filtering by order number using local state and OrderTable component.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Design: Modal dialog component for viewing design images with zoom (0.5x-3x) and pan functionality, supporting both mouse and touch interactions. Fetches design image data using a custom hook and displays loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Hallma: Tab component displaying hallmark orders with filters for order type (CO/RB), karigar name, order number search, and date range. Uses OrderTable to render filtered results from the hallmark orders query.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Kariga: Tab component that groups pending orders by karigar name and displays them as clickable cards showing total orders and weight. Each card navigates to a detailed karigar view when clicked.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Table component for displaying orders with optional bulk selection, status updates to Ready, and export functionality (Excel, PDF, JPEG). Groups orders by design code and supports row selection with confirmation dialogs for status changes.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/ReadyT: Tab component displaying orders with Ready status, featuring filters for order type (CO/RB), karigar name, order number search, and date range. Renders filtered results using the OrderTable component.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Summar: Dashboard summary component displaying four metric cards: total orders, total weight, total quantity, and customer orders count. Shows loading skeletons while data is being fetched.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Suppli: Dialog component for entering supplied quantity when marking RB orders as Ready. Validates that supplied quantity is positive and does not exceed the order quantity before confirming.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalO: Displays a filterable table of pending and return-from-hallmark orders with filters for order type (CO/RB), karigar name, and order number search. Includes bulk action support via OrderTable component.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Unmapp: Shows an alert banner for unmapped design codes, grouping orders by design and indicating missing generic/karigar mappings. Provides navigation buttons to view all unmapped codes or update master designs.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Renders the main application sidebar with navigation menu items (Dashboard, Ingest Orders, Unmapped Codes, Master Designs, Design Images, Tag Printing, Barcode Scanning) and footer branding. Uses collapsible sidebar component with active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/masterdesigns/Ed: Modal dialog for editing design-to-karigar mappings with ability to select existing karigars or add new ones. Updates design mappings and reassigns pending orders to the new karigar.
frontend/src/components/tagprinting/Webv: Full-screen modal that embeds an external MPN system URL in an iframe with loading state and sandboxed permissions. Used for tag printing workflow integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes due to identity updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking. Creates AuthClient with configurable options and handles identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders, design mappings, karigars, and related data from the backend actor. Includes hooks for filtering orders by status/type/karigar, bulk operations, file uploads, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including gold accent colors for jewelry business branding. Defines global styles for transitions, hover states, focus states, and disabled states.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/BarcodeScanning.tsx: Implements barcode scanning functionality supporting both hardware scanners (via keyboard events) and camera-based QR scanning. Allows bulk status updates of scanned orders with visual feedback and duplicate detection.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with tabs for viewing total orders, ready orders, hallmark orders, customer orders, and karigars. Includes summary cards and an unmapped orders section.
frontend/src/pages/DesignImages.tsx: Handles bulk upload of design images either from a folder or ZIP file. Extracts design codes from filenames, processes images in batches, and uploads them to the backend as ExternalBlob objects.
frontend/src/pages/IngestOrders.tsx: Parses Excel files containing order data and uploads orders to the backend in batches. Validates design mappings exist and displays progress with detailed error reporting for failed uploads.
frontend/src/pages/KarigarDetail.tsx: Displays details for a specific karigar including their pending orders, total weight, and quantity, with functionality to export pending orders to PDF.
frontend/src/pages/MasterDesigns.tsx: Manages master design mappings by allowing Excel upload of design-to-karigar assignments, handles bulk mapping updates, and automatically assigns orders to karigars based on mappings.
frontend/src/pages/TagPrinting.tsx: Provides interface for printing tags for ready orders via MPN system, including login management and batch processing with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/UnmappedCodes.tsx: Displays design codes from orders that are missing generic name or karigar assignments, allowing inline editing to complete the mappings.
frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts: Parses Excel files for both order data and master design mappings, normalizing design codes and validating required fields with error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/exportUtils.ts: Provides export functionality to Excel and PDF formats, including fetching design images from backend and generating formatted reports grouped by design code.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining theme extensions including custom colors (using oklch color space), fonts (Inter and Playfair Display), container settings, border radius variables, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a jewellery order management system that maps design codes from orders to Generic Name and Karigar Name using a Master Design Excel file, with pending fixes for design code normalization (uppercase/trim) and automatic order updates upon Excel upload.
